title: Moonlight
overview: After graduating from university, Chu Li, passionate about publishing, successfully got a job in the company of her dreams, yuan Yue Publishing House. However, there is a difficult path ahead of her. She learns that the publishing industry has undergone huge changes. As a newcomer to the newsroom, Chu Li remains true to his original aspirations, helping authors to improve their work and publish high quality books with all their hearts. With her sincerity and professionalism Chu Li has earned the respect of famous authors and became their exclusive editor. At the same time, it helps authors in creative crisis find new inspiration, as well as their unique vision of finding new potential authors. Chu Li overcomes obstacles in his career and finally becomes a recognized editor. She also learns that her close online friend "L Jun" is a well-known writer zhou Chuan.
